hero.title: Mourad MAMASSI
hero.subtitle: Tech Lead & Software Engineer JAVA | Certified Spring | CKAD | DevOps
hero.summary: I design and build robust and secure software solutions, with a focus on the banking sector. Specialized in Java Spring and cloud architecture (AWS), I leverage my expertise in DevOps and Kubernetes to orchestrate seamless deployments. I also mentor teams as a coach and facilitator to help them grow and achieve their goals.

projects.title: Credit Risk Models Management
projects.description: As a Tech Lead, I led the full lifecycle of this web platform, managing a distributed team, including collaboration with members based in Bangalore. This experience strengthened my leadership and English communication skills. I managed user stories and end-to-end development, from design to production. I implemented an automated CI/CD pipeline for smooth deployments and optimized the infrastructure for performance and resilience using an AWS Aurora database. I also created an automated alert system (based on capacity thresholds) and a 'Lights On-Off' system to reduce infrastructure costs by 40%.

projects.title: Credit Risk Calculation Engine
projects.description: This backend engine executes credit risk models in real-time and in batch mode, processing millions of contracts. I led this project in full DevOps mode, from CI/CD automation to production monitoring, collaborating with our team in Bangalore. I used an internal Jenkins library and AWS CloudFormation CDK for Infrastructure as Code (IaC). The batch part is managed by an AWS Step Functions workflow with rollback and retry mechanisms, ensuring the resilience and reliability of the process.

projects.title: SelfCare Monétique — Société Générale
projects.description: A critical banking application used by around 8 million clients to manage their card services autonomously: blocking, increasing limits, etc. This project demanded a high level of security, availability, and performance, integrating with national payment systems.

projects.title: Apple Pay Enrollment — Société Générale
projects.description: An essential backend application to allow clients to enroll their bank cards in Apple Pay. The system verifies client eligibility based on numerous business rules to ensure security, compliance, and an optimal user experience for mobile payments.

projects.title: Cryptographic Keys Management — Société Générale
projects.description: A tool for describing and generating keys for banking payment systems, with a secure cloud architecture. I participated in the development of the backend (Spring Boot, Java) and frontend (Angular), with a secure deployment on AWS via Docker.

projects.title: Software Engineer Internship — Enedis
projects.description: Development of a web application for the DR Alpes operational domain, adding functionalities not available on the company's Sequoia tool. This application helped to optimize internal processes and provide greater flexibility to users for managing operational data.
